## Erc1155.getOwned() method

Get Owned NFTs

## Example

```javascript
// Address of the wallet to get the NFTs of
const address = "{{wallet_address}}";
const nfts = await contract.erc1155.getOwned(address);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOwned(walletAddress?: string): Promise<NFT[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description       |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------- |
| walletAddress | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFT](./sdk.nft.md)\[\]&gt;

The NFT metadata for all NFTs in the contract.

## Remarks

Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.
